dimension: 6 7/16 x 1 x 7/8 in. (16.35 x 2.54 x 2.22 cm) (without ties or fringe)
medium: Animal hide, glass beads, quills, metal bugle beads, feathers
title: Awl Case
description: tapering tube shape with flap cover, pierced with carrying strap; body has striped design in clear, blue, pink and yellow beads; flap is striped with clear, blue and green beads; two long tassels on flap, three on body, wrapped with red and green quills and terminating in metal bugle beads and red feathers
creditline: Gift of Evan M. Maurer in honor of Dr. Josie R. Johnson and George Horse Capture
